column5: Amore is a range of bright reds and yellows. Superb quality with a beautiful finish; this range is a range you will simply fall in love with.
column6: Heat set polypropylene frise; machine made.
column7: Non-shedding; highly stain resistant; durable; tight weave; soft under foot; rich colour pallete; colour fast; antistatic and easy to clean
column13: Regular vacuuming required. Do not use power or rotary head vacuum cleaners. Professional cleaning recommended. Any spills should be blotted up immediately. Keep out of direct sunlight.
